name: Decision-tree-homework-fall-2016
body:
Using the ID3 algorithm discussed in class, create the decision tree to prediction **Class: buys_computer** from the following table. NOTE: You can ignore the **RID column**.

![AllElectronics Table](https://www.dropbox.com/s/nv938dss2dg0e9k/TableAllElectronics.png?dl=0)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
